obvious.prefuse.data
Class PrefuseObviousTable

java.lang.Object
  obvious.prefuse.data.PrefuseObviousTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
obvious.data.Data, obvious.data.Table, obvious.util.Adaptable
public class PrefuseObviousTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements obvious.data.Table

This class is in an implementation of the Table interface based on Prefuse Table class. Since Obvious and Prefuse tables adopt the same design approach, this class is mainly a wrapper: Prefuse tables are fully compatible with Obvious ones.

Author:
Pierre-Luc Hemery
See Also:
Table
